## Project Overview
SpanishVideoMaster - A B2-level Spanish learning app for Vietnamese learners via YouTube videos.

**Tech Stack:**
- React 18+ with Vite
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- React Player for YouTube integration
- Mock OpenAI integration (Whisper + GPT-4o)

**Core Features:**
- YouTube video integration with karaoke-style subtitles
- Multi-language subtitles (Spanish/Vietnamese/English)
- Interactive word dictionary with verb conjugation
- B2-level DELE-style listening tests
- AI-powered transcription and translation (mocked)
- Progress tracking and error analysis
